Info

Defines class ATSLoggerStatus with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for ATS logger status in one propery object.

class ats_utilities.logging.ats_logger_status.ATSLoggerStatus(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class ATSLoggerStatus with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for ATS logger status in one propery object. Logging control mechanism.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
_log_status - Logger status (enabled/disabled).
methods:
__init__ - Initial ATSLoggerStatus constructor.
logger_status - Property methods for set/get operations.
_log_status: bool¶
_verbose: bool¶
property logger_status: bool¶

Property method for getting logger status.

Returns:

True (logger operative) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None

verbose = 'ATS_UTILITIES'¶
